position.marginalia_text: Vide, planetarum status, idem no[n] similis, [...] co[n]trarius in aliquib[us] respectib[us] fuerit

marginalia.translation: See, the status of the planets, like it was not similar, [but] more contrary in other respects.

position.marginalia_text: Qua r[ati]o[n]e ea qua[e] nativitati applicantur, etia[m] revolutioni inservire possu[n]t ta[m]qu[am] eius anni nativitate

marginalia.translation: By which reason those which are connected to the birth, even can serve the interest of the revolution just as the birth of that year.

position.marginalia_text: At in Vno revolue[n]di modo sol no[n] pervenit ad locu[m] in quo tempore nativitatis erat: vt infra videre potes fo. 262.

marginalia.translation: But in one way of reverting the sun does not arrive towards the place in which time of the nativity it was: as below, you can see folio 262.

underline.text: naturam reuolutionu[m] sequi natura[m] geniturarum, sed debilius.
Cum hoc igitur iuuaberis ex omnibus capitulis aspectuu[m] & fixarum, & caeteris quae scripsi pro genituris
